name: No Haven in Hallow Cove
description:
Disclaimer:

 This game is best enjoyed in full screen.

Nothing ever happens in Hallow Cove Beach. That’s how small-town stories always go, don’t they? Nothing ever happens here. At least, that’s how they should go. But lately, you’ve been stumbling into more mess than you could have ever imagined. Now you’re wondering just how many secrets might be simmering below the surface, deep in the bowels of town, waiting to boil over.

The Case:

Brooklynn Windsor-Lowe is missing. Been missing, actually. For a week. You shouldn’t care this much. You haven’t been friendly, much less friends, in a decade. None of your old group has. But she vanished without a trace, and lately you’ve seen Sheriff McDickDuff at the bar more than the station. Someone needs to look out for her. You can’t quite put your finger on it, but there’s a stink about the town (and it isn’t the mystery meat in the cafeteria). Time to take things into your own hands. Tread carefully; you just might make it out alive (and if you’re lucky, in time for curfew).

What secrets are hiding in Hallow Cove? Every passing minute takes you a little farther away from Brooklynn, and a little farther away from the truth. Will you discover them in time to save her life?

Your own?
